attributes.action: Stop the treasury having access to bank account details for default payers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who do not pay their tax bills could have the cash taken directly from their bank account under proposals unveiled by HM Revenue and Customs. The tax man would not need court permission to remove or freeze assets to pay the bill.

The Treasury should not have access to our fiscal accounts without some form of judicial review to prevent abuse! 
Mistakes happen by the Government (as has happened on many, many occasions!), how difficult would it be to get back our money when they make a mistake? 
We may disagree with their view and we should have the right of appeal without a "Little John" scenario from the days of Robin Hood.
